The Muslim

Open Google Console Get Application

"The Muslim is a free Islamic app for Android phones and tablets.The Muslim is an excellent source of perpetual charity (Sadqa e Jariah)."

Key Features:
  1. Interface that is adaptable and simple to use.
  2. Surahs can be listened to online using WIFI or Mobile Data.
  3. Audio that is clear, high-quality, and loud.
  4. Lock the screen allows you to lock the screen so that it does not stop or change surahs if you accidentally click on it.
  5. With one click, Share the App allows you to share the application with friends and family.
  6. You can contact the developer by filling out a Google form to suggest new features, new reciters, or to report a bug.

Wazaif 365

Get Application

"Wazaif 365 a Pray app for Muslims - Your Ultimate Islamic Prayer Companion Discover a treasure trove of authentic and verified Islamic prayers and supplications with the Wazaif for Muslims app, now available for download on the Google Play Store. This comprehensive Islamic application is your trusted companion in the spiritual journey, designed to help you perform your daily prayers and supplications effortlessly.

Key Features:
  1. Authentic Wazaif Collection: Explore a vast collection of time-tested and authentic Islamic prayers and supplications (wazaif) that cater to various aspects of your life, from daily routines to special occasions.
  2. Verified Sources: Our team of Islamic scholars meticulously verifies and sources every prayer and supplication, ensuring that you receive only the most reliable and accurate guidance.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Navigate the app with ease using our intuitive and user-friendly interface. Whether you are a novice or experienced in Islamic practices, our app is designed for everyone.
  4. Daily Reminders: Set personalized daily reminders to help you stay consistent in your spiritual practices. Never miss an important prayer or supplication again.
  5. Duas for Every Occasion: From seeking protection to asking for guidance and blessings, our app provides you with prayers for various situations and challenges in life.
  6. Offline Access: Enjoy offline access to your favorite wazaif, ensuring you can stay connected to your faith even without an internet connection.
